pages.text: $(bred)Flag Zombie$() often appears as the $(bred)huge wave$() team leader zombie.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)19$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : Flag Zombie with $(bgreen)green beard$() has $(l)Normal$() Damage. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
